Name: Pixel Monsters Survival
About the game: Protect your little pixel animal Sometimes the pixel monster comes, you have to defeat him as soon as possible. You can defeat him with your hands or create a special weapon like a club or bow. Game goals: You have to live as long as possible( if you take too much damage then your character will die and you will lose the game) Protect the little pixel monster( If the little pixel monster dies, you will lose the game) You have to eat from time to time, remember to also feed your little pixel monster( If your or pixel monster's hunger level reaches zero then you lose the game) picking fruits cutting trees and quarrying stones(materials can be used to build weapons)
